heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly to partly cloudy, except mostly sunny in southeastern valleys. Valley highs from the mid teens to around 20, with some lower teens far north, and mid to upper 20s southeast. Winds from the west to northwest at 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. A rising chance of snow late, with a trace to 2 inches, mainly in the Adirondacks and southern Greens. Lows from zero to 10 above, with northeastern cold hollows 5 to 10 below. Winds becoming light and variable early, then becoming south 5 to 10 mph from the Green Mountains westward.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly cloudy, with snow likely in the morning; then a chance of snow showers or squalls in the afternoon, mainly late; daytime snow accumulation 1 to 3 inches. Highs from the mid 20s to around 30 north, low to mid 30s in the south. Winds becoming south to southeast 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph in the Champlain Valley.
